channel.title: Projects on Linux Bytes
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Linux Bytes

item.title: Cpp System Monitor
item.description: CppND-System-Monitor Starter code for System Monitor Project in the C++ OOP course. In which I used for Udacity course on OOP. Github link CppND-System-Monitor

item.title: List of Projects
item.description: Projects This is list of of my projects, language and technology that I have work with. In each page the projects with a summary and github links. Page Links Cpp System Monitor

item.title: Route Planning Project
item.description: Route Planning Project In this project, I had use OpenStreetMap data and the IO2D visualization library to build a route planner that finds a path between two points on a real-world map Github link Route Planning Project

item.title: jQuery Badges Project
item.description: Use jQuery to Fetch and Show Code School Badges Using Ajax I build a personal web page that displays the courses which I completed on Code School by pulling data from the Code School website. GitHub Link jQuery Badges Project
